name: FAC_CHG_OVERRIDE
description: Scoring system information for emergency department level of service calculations.

columns.name: PAT_ENC_CSN_ID
columns.description: The unique contact serial number for this contact. This number is unique across all patient encounters in your system. If you use IntraConnect this is the Unique Contact Identifier (UCI).

columns.name: PAT_ENC_DATE_REAL
columns.description: This is a numeric representation of the date of this encounter in your system. The integer portion of the number specifies the date of the encounter. The digits after the decimal point indicate multiple visits on one day.

columns.name: CONTACT_DATE
columns.description: The date of this contact in calendar format.

columns.name: CM_CT_OWNER_ID
columns.description: The Community ID (CID) of the deployment owner for this contact.

columns.name: FAC_CHG_CALC_SCR
columns.description: Stores the calculated points for the ED facility charge scoring system.

columns.name: FAC_CHG_OVR_SYS_SCR
columns.description: The user-entered score for the facility charge calculation. This overrides the calculated value during calculation of the charge level.

columns.name: FAC_CHG_OVR_USR_ID
columns.description: The ID of the last user to override the facility charge calculator score.

columns.name: FAC_CHG_OVR_USR_ID_NAME
columns.description: The name of the user record. This name may be hidden.

columns.name: FAC_CHG_OVR_INST
columns.description: The instant of the last facility charge calculation score.
